entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
